abstract: Apple announced Friday that it would not add any new episodes of NBC television shows to the online store’s inventory, as the companies’ dispute over pricing continued.
snippet: Apple announced Friday that it would not add any new episodes of NBC television shows to the online store’s inventory, as the companies’ dispute over pricing continued.
lead_paragraph: The dispute between Apple and NBC Universal over the pricing of videos on iTunes grew more heated yesterday as Apple announced that it would not add any new episodes of NBC television shows to the online store’s inventory.

headline.main: No New NBC Shows to Be Sold by Apple
headline.print_headline: No New NBC Shows to Be Sold by Apple
